ActorTalk: Distress signal detected. Analyzing signal source... Source identified. Confirming target...
Target identity confirmed: Gray Raven Commandant [PlayerName]. Initiating rescue operation...
Emotional fluctuation detected in target. Activating comfort protocol...
Difficulties are nothing to fear. The best way to overcome challenges is to face them head-on!
You are strong. Believe in yourself. You can overcome any challenge. You've got this!
Why did it suddenly rush over like that? It must be malfunctioning. Better put it in standby mode, just to be safe.
I should report this to the staff.
I never sent a distress signal, though?
